description: Book an appointment for cleaning services. Available services: Deep Cleaning ($150, 100 min), Standard Cleaning ($100, 60 min with customization options). Service items use their 'identifier' field as keys.

appointment_date_time.description: Appointment date and time in human-readable format (e.g., '2025-10-15 14:00', 'tomorrow at 2pm', 'next Monday at 3pm')

bedroom.description: Number of bedrooms to clean (identifier: bedroom). $10 per bedroom, adds 30 minutes each. Required for Standard Cleaning.

do_you_want_driveway_cleaned.description: Whether to clean the driveway (identifier: do_you_want_driveway_cleaned). Yes = $10, No = Free. Optional.

select_cleaner_product.description: Cleaner product choice (identifier: select_cleaner_product). Options: 'best cleaner' ($10) or 'better cleaner' ($20). Required for Standard Cleaning.

date_time_str.description: Date and Time for Which we have to check Availability in Human ReadAble Format or As It is As User provide
